about_the_game:
The game is currently in alpha, having many bugs and incomplete functionality. Only buy if you are aware that the game will not be stable or have great features before the beta release! We are working daily to bring this idea to the real world.


Price Planning:
Launch discount of 25%



Based on my deepest desires to be rich, I found a way to make everyone, or at least simulate, that experience. Re Estate is a third-person game, a simulator of buying and selling and renting real estate proprieties and a financial life simulator as a whole. The main objective of the game is to stay alive and to accumulate wealth.

Gameplay

In Re-Estate, you control an 18-year-old character who has just lost his parents, who left him a debt of 20 thousand dollars. Your goal will be to prosper by paying off this debt and showing that even with nothing you can grow! In the game, you will be presented with several challenges such as hunger, thirst, and aging, you will have to create your real estate empire and pass on to your offspring much more than your parents left you.

Different Ways to Make Money

We are currently developing the game but here a complete list of ways who are going to be available to make money

Get a job
Buy, Sell and Rent Real Estate Properties
Run Different Types of Businesses
Investment Funds
And in the a most
and in a more distant future Stock Market

Open World

The game is completely open world and sandbox, there is no right way to play, you should do your own way.
We also want to reach a point where you can buy stuff like in the real world and enjoy the money you're getting, like buying cars, proprieties for own usage, furniture for your houses and much more.. It all depends of how good accepted the first versions are going to be.

content_descriptors.notes: General criminal action simulation such as drug dealing, robbery and other kind of criminal acts.
